_comment: This is a translation from the original English to Persian. For a better tranlsation meaning, 'privacy' was translated as 'government censorship'. Unfinished.
sect1_description: .با افزایش برنامه های سانسور دولت، توكس برنامه هست که اجازه می دهد که شما را با دوستان و خانواده بدون سانسور تماس بگیرید
sect2_aboutbody: .توكس با این ایده درست شود که شما می توانید با دوستان و خانواده صحبت بکنید بدون در حال جاسوسی از دولت
sect3_messages_blurb:
At your fingertips.
 You're always in the loop with instant encrypted messaging.
sect3_voice_blurb:
Stay in touch.
 Make free and secure Tox to Tox calls.
sect3_video_blurb:
Seeing is believing.
 Catch up face to face with a secure video call.
sect4_principles: Instant messaging, video conferencing, and more
sect4_security_blurb:
Tox takes your privacy seriously.
With leading-class encryption, you can rest assured knowing that the only people reading your messages are the ones you send them to.
sect4_easy_blurb: Unlike other secure messaging solutions, Tox does not require you to be a computer programmer to use it. Tox comes out-of-the-box with an easy-to-use interface that allows you to focus on your conversations.
sect4_freedom_blurb: Tox is both free for you to use, and free for you to change. You are completely free to both use and modify Tox. Furthermore, Tox will never harass you with ads, or require you to pay for features.
sect5_github: Want to help? We're on GitHub. No coding experience is necessary.
sect6_developers: We're cool guys from all around the world.
sect6_joinongithub: Help build TOX on GitHub.
sect6_githubtoirc: Start your own project and ask us on GitHub, or in IRC!
